text:
Signkick - http://www.signkick.com | Full-stack Engineer, Back-end Engineer & UX/UI Designer | Full-time | Amsterdam, Netherlands | ONSITE

We're opening up the world of outdoor advertising. Through us, you can book a billboard online as easy as you can order business cards. We also offer our platform as a SaaS solution to out of home companies, so they can offer their own billboards on their own website.

To make this an even better experience for both our advertisers and SaaS customers, we're hiring:

- A Full-stack Engineer: http://careers.signkick.com/o/full-stack-php-developer

- A Back-End Engineer: http://careers.signkick.com/o/back-end-php-developer

- An UX/UI Designer: http://careers.signkick.com/o/ux-ui-designer-with-coding-ski...

Why Signkick?

- Small & fast growing company,

- A tangible product - you can see billboards booked through our platform everywhere,

- Good salary and we offer equity,

- Office in the middle of vibrant Amsterdam,

- International orientation - based in both Amterdam and London, with customers everywhere

Our stack consists of AngularJS, Symfony3 (PHP7), MySQL, MongoDB, Memcached, RabbitMQ and more

Apply here: http://careers.signkick.com

â€“ Sebastiaan Schinkel, Co-Founder & CTO
